document_data.caption: A map showing Ghemmer's Alley branching south off of Spiderweb Alley.
document_data.name: Ghemmer's Alley
document_data.mainbody: '''Ghemmer's Alley''' was a small backalley that was located in the city of [[Waterdeep]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Location: Ghemmer's Alley was connected to [[Spiderweb Alley]] in Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Dock Ward|Dock Ward]], branching south off of the larger alley to encircle a group of buildings.
